title: Need a Top Laner for Ranked Team
body:
Hi guys,
I have 4 people in my ranked team at the moment but we need a top laner. We are a bronze team looking to improve. If you are intersted in join us please post here, thank you.

replies.body:
Age: 21
Role: top
Top lane picks: {{champion:75}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:10}} 
commutation ([Y]/N): team speak, Skype
availability: Most days, as long as I get notice of when we're going to play.
IGN : Gigawatts

Age: 18
Role: top
Top lane picks: {{champion:150}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:105}} (ad fizz)
commutation ([Y]/N): team speech, Skype
availability: after school most days, Wednesdays all day, weekends
Note: 9 time out of 10 i'm free but just give me a few days notice for games
IGN : DuSt235
